scripts.copy-skia-headers: yarn rimraf ./cpp/skia/modules/ && mkdir -p ./cpp/skia/modules/skottie/include && mkdir -p ./cpp/skia/modules/skottie/src/text && cp -a ../../externals/skia/modules/skottie/include/. ./cpp/skia/modules/skottie/include && cp ../../externals/skia/modules/skottie/src/text/SkottieShaper.h ./cpp/skia/modules/skottie/src/text/SkottieShaper.h
